communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello, I would like to request the following information,
What are the current precious metal reserves of the country? Either by ounce or by pound. I am not asking for a new audit of our reserves just the most up to date information. Can you please include reserve fuel and oil.


This request is not being made for commercial purposes.

There should not be any fees associated with this request but in the event that there are fees, please fulfill my request along with an attached invoice. Delivery via email attachment is preferred and authorized.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mason C. Turner
